titles.title: A bill to require the Securities and Exchange Commission to prevent the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority from enforcing a certain rule of that Authority.
A bill to require the Securities and Exchange Commission to prevent the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority from enforcing a certain rule of that Authority.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: This bill directs the Securities and Exchange Commission to prevent the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority from enforcing that authority's rule requiring member brokers and dealers to annually inspect their offices for compliance with securities laws and regulations.
